Package com.atakmap.comms.http

Class TakHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.comms.http.TakHttpClient
  • public class TakHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an HttpClient with proper TLS certificates

    • Constructor Detail

      • TakHttpClient

        public TakHttpClient​(java.lang.String url)
        Setup HTTP client. HTTPS base URLs use TLS to include client certificates. Uses internally stored certificates HTTP URLs use Basic Auth
        Parameters:
        url - the base url

      • TakHttpClient

        public TakHttpClient​(java.lang.String url,
                     java.lang.String connectString)
        Setup HTTP client. HTTPS base URLs use TLS to include client certificates. Uses internally stored certificates HTTP URLs use Basic Auth
        Parameters:
        url - the base url
        connectString - the connectString which is in turn used for the certificate lookup to ensure that https are made with the correct client cert for the port

      • TakHttpClient

        public TakHttpClient​(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                     org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory sslSocketFactory)
        Setup HTTP client with a given sslSocketFactory. Note it is up to the caller to provide a complete baseUrl with protocol, host, and port info
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - the base url
        sslSocketFactory - the socket factory to be used

      • TakHttpClient

        public TakHttpClient​(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                     org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory sslSocketFactory,
                     int connectTimeout,
                     int soTimeout)
        Setup HTTP client with a given sslSocketFactory and custom timeout values. Note it is up to the caller to provide a complete baseUrl with protocol, host, and port info
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - the base url
        sslSocketFactory - the socket factory to be used
        connectTimeout - the connection timeout
        soTimeout - the socket timeout

    • Method Detail

      • GetHttpClient

        public static TakHttpClient GetHttpClient​(java.lang.String url)
        Creates an HttpClient and proper TAK Server base URL Uses internally stored certificates
        Parameters:
        url - the base url
        Returns:
        the corresponding client

      • GetHttpClient

        public static TakHttpClient GetHttpClient​(java.lang.String url,
                                          java.lang.String connectString)
        Creates an HttpClient and proper TAK Server base URL Uses internally stored certificates
        Parameters:
        url - the base url
        connectString - the connectString which is in turn used for the certificate lookup to ensure that https are made with the correct client cert for the port
        Returns:
        the corresponding client

      • GetHttpClient

        public static TakHttpClient GetHttpClient​(java.lang.String url,
                                          NetConnectString connectString)
        Creates an HttpClient and proper TAK Server base URL Uses internally stored certificates
        Parameters:
        url - the base url
        connectString - the connectString which is in turn used for the certificate lookup to ensure that https are made with the correct client cert for the port; a null connectString will result in attempting best effort to derive certs from the given url
        Returns:
        the corresponding client

      • GetHttpClient

        public static TakHttpClient GetHttpClient​(org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory factory,
                                          java.lang.String url)
        Creates an HttpClient using specified socket factory
        Parameters:
        factory - the socket factory to use
        url - the url to use when creating a client
        Returns:
        the client corresponding to the url.

        public java.lang.String getUrl()
        Get the TAK (Server) base URL
        Returns:
        the String representation of the baseURL

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl​(java.lang.String path)
        Get the TAK (Server) URL for specified path
        Parameters:
        path - the path to be used for lookup
        Returns:
        the path appropriately added to the url

      • useBasicAuth

        public boolean useBasicAuth()
        False for HTTPs, true for HTTP
        Returns:
        false if the url is https

      • addBasicAuthentication

        public void addBasicAuthentication​(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)
        Add Basic Auth for HTTP, not HTTPS (which typically uses client certificates)
        Parameters:
        request - the request to add basic auth to.

      • addBasicAuthentication

        public void addBasicAuthentication​(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request,
                                   AtakAuthenticationCredentials credentials)
        Add Basic Auth for the request using the credentials provided
        Parameters:
        request - the request to add basic auth to.
        credentials - the credentials to use to set up the basic auth.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        verify - Verify response contains this string

      • getGZip

        public java.lang.String getGZip​(java.lang.String url,
                                java.lang.String verify)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Perform an HTTP GET on the URL, support GZip
        Parameters:
        url - the url to perform a http get on.
        verify - the string that is to be contained in the response
        Returns:
        response body as String if HTTP OK 200 is returned by serve
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is an issue with the gzip'd data

      • getGZip

        public java.lang.String getGZip​(java.lang.String url,
                                java.lang.String verify,
                                java.lang.String accept)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Perform an HTTP GET on the URL, support GZip
        Parameters:
        url - the url to perform a http get on.
        verify - the string that is to be contained in the response
        accept - Set "Accept" header on request
        Returns:
        response body as String if HTTP OK 200 is returned by serve
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is an issue with the gzip'd data

        Perform an HTTP GET on the URL
        Parameters:
        url - URL to get
        verify - Verify response contains this string
        accept - Set "Accept" header on request
        Returns:
        response body as String if HTTP OK 200 is returned by server
        Throws:

      • head

        public boolean head​(java.lang.String url)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Perform HTTP HEAD on the URL
        Parameters:
        url - url to perform a http head on.
        Returns:
        true if content is not on server (does not return HTTP OK 200)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
